title: Enterprise in steam
creator_credit: Brian Bosisto, John Dick and Bosisto Productions
brief_description: The story of the Pichi Pichi Railway Preservation Society and their efforts in re-opening 32 kilometres of historical railway track at Quorn in South Australia’s northern region. Apart from showing the restoration of steam locomotive carriages and bridges the film shows the spirit of enterprise in a community
